title: Loaned
description: Bettina's Master gets off on loaning her to strangers. Afterward, she's supposed to report back to him with all the raunchy details. It's all kinky fun and games, until one of those strangers decides he doesn't want to give her back...This 18K-word novella includes all the rough, intense BDSM loveliness that Annabel Joseph is famous for, along with a happily ever after. Haven't read her yet? See what everyone else is talking about and pick up LOANED at this low promotional price.
author: Annabel Joseph
